summary: I am an experienced Analyst and Manager dedicated to bridging the gap between raw data and real-world results. My passion lies in developing analysis that does more than just report numbers—it creates insights and drives performance. I thrive in cross-functional settings, partnering with diverse teams to solve complex problems under tight deadlines.

achievements: Served as the Business Owner for Contact Center Analytics, overseeing the end-to-end delivery of insights for credit card operations. Leveraged the full spectrum of analytics—from descriptive reporting to predictive modeling—to enhance day-to-day management. Additionally, partnered with leadership to measure the ROI and impact of large-scale strategic transformations.
Collaborated with clients to deliver responsive e-commerce websites for various fashion and retail brands.
Conducted A/B testing on landing pages which increased conversion rates by an average of 12% across client projects.
Created high-fidelity interactive prototypes in Figma for stakeholder presentations.
Assisted in the implementation of the company's marketing site using React and Tailwind CSS.
Optimized image assets and code splitting, improving page load speeds by 40%.

projects.title: E-Commerce UI Kit
projects.description: A complete open-source design system for online stores.

projects.title: TaskMaster App
projects.description: Productivity application focused on deep work techniques.
